From: (USANYS) <

To: (OIG) < 
. 
(NY) (FBI) < 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Sign in SHU 
(NY) (OGA) 
(FBI) <I
>; 
Thank you. The record came from Associate Warden Will you please reach out to her, give her the 
standard voluntariness warning, and ask her where the sign came from? Can you please ask how she got it, whether she 
took it from the SHU, and when. Can you also ask who created it and hung it up? It is possible she was given this 
document by someone else and won't know the answer to the majority of these questions. If that's the case, we'll want 
to find out who had the sign / who knows the information and interview that person. If, on the other hand, she is 
knowledgeable about the sign (including why it was hung and who took it down and when), and I will want to 
interview her by phone. Of course, do a  302/MOI. Thanks very much and let us know if you have any questions.

to interview that person, which we may ask you to facilitate.

I re-read the FBI 302s and the DOJ OIG MOls. There was no mention of any signage, posters, written unique instructions, 
or anything that fit the description of what was provided from you. 
U.S. Department of Justice 
Office of the Inspector General 
New York Field Office 
One Battery Park Plaza, 29th Floor 
New York, NY 10004 
(Office) 
(Cell Phone) 
From: (USANYS) < 
Sent: Sunday, July 26, 202011:11 PM 
To: . (NY) 
(OGA) 
(FBI) 
-.(OIG) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: Sign in 
SHU 
Hi folks, 
(NY) (FBI) < 
>; 
I have a recollection that when we were interviewing employees at the MCC, one or more individuals told us there was a 
sign posted in the SHU that said to do your checks on Epstein. If memory serves, we never recovered the document. But 
last week we got a production of records from the BOP as part of FOIA litigation that included the attached. Can you 
remind us (a) if there was in fact some employee who told us about this sign â€” I haven't looked at all the 302s and MOls, 
and (b) of anything we did to try to get this sign previously (if we did in fact make inquiries). 
Thanks, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel: 
Cell: 
EFTA00031996
